author: "Dirty" Harry Callahan
title: Do You Feel Lucky?
body: I know what you're thinking because right about now I'm thinking the same thing: "Did he fire six shots? Or only five?" Now to tell the truth, I've kind of lost count in all this excitemem=nt, but seeing as this is a .45 magnum, the most powerful handgun known to man, you've got to ask yourself a question: "Do I feel lucky?" Well do Ya, punk?
